code:
graph TB
    APB0[FinTech_TransactionQueue] --> GRP0[FinTech_AuthVault]
    APB1[FinTech_FraudDetection] --> GRP1[FinTech_TransactionQueue]
    APB7[FinTech_AuthVault] --> GRP7[FinTech_LedgerService]

    CFG[FinTech_LedgerService] --> GRP0
    CFG --> GRP1
    CFG --> GRP7

    subgraph "Scheduler Group Array"
        GRP0 --> |desc_ar_*| AR_ARB[FinTech_TransactionQueue]
        GRP1 --> |desc_ar_*| AR_ARB
        GRP7 --> |desc_ar_*| AR_ARB

        AR_ARB --> |desc_axi_ar_*| DESC_AXI[FinTech_PaymentGateway]
        DESC_AXI --> |desc_axi_r_*| R_BCAST[FinTech_PaymentGateway]

        R_BCAST --> |desc_r_* ID-based claim| GRP0
        R_BCAST --> |desc_r_*| GRP1
        R_BCAST --> |desc_r_*| GRP7

        DESC_AXI --> MON_TAP[FinTech_AuthVault]

        GRP0 --> |datard/wr_valid| DATA_IF[FinTech_LedgerService]
        GRP1 --> |datard/wr_valid| DATA_IF
        GRP7 --> |datard/wr_valid| DATA_IF

        GRP0 --> |mon_valid/packet| MON_AGG[FinTech_LedgerService]
        GRP1 --> |mon_valid/packet| MON_AGG
        GRP7 --> |mon_valid/packet| MON_AGG
        MON_TAP --> |mon_valid/packet| MON_AGG

        MON_AGG --> |mon_valid/ready/packet| MON_OUT[FinTech_PaymentGateway]
    end

    DATA_IF --> |"datard[FinTech_PaymentGateway]"| RD_ENG[FinTech_FraudDetection]
    DATA_IF --> |"datawr[FinTech_TransactionQueue]"| WR_ENG[FinTech_LedgerService]

    RD_ENG --> |"datard_done[FinTech_FraudDetection]"| DATA_IF
    WR_ENG --> |"datawr_done[FinTech_TransactionQueue]"| DATA_IF

    style AR_ARB fill:#f9f,stroke:#333,stroke-width:3px
    style DESC_AXI fill:#bbf,stroke:#333,stroke-width:2px
    style MON_AGG fill:#bfb,stroke:#333,stroke-width:2px
    style DATA_IF fill:#ffb,stroke:#333,stroke-width:2px
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
